title: Champion reworks
body:
Hey guys,

So the team at riot have been working pretty hard to remake some of leagues least balanced or least changed champions, and it's really cool that they are giving champions the love and care that they need. But i was wondering if anyone knows if they have a refund policy for skins bought on remade champions? Not that there is anything wrong with the champions, its just that I liked how they use to play. For example fiora, use to be a like a melee adc, kind of like a talon and I really liked that about her, so I bought a skin for her. Since the rework I've played her a couple of times, and I really don't like it. It's not fun for me to play, and the skin now isn't what i paid for. I feel similar about the darius rework. I mained darus a couple of seasons ago, and instantly blew 20 bucks on the dunk lord skin when it came out. But then he moved from an early game cheese champion, to a late game hyper tank carry. I got use to the darius remake because he was op and I had high win rates on him, plus dunk lord is an amazing skin and I really wanted to keep it. But I'm sure there must be others out there that felt more strongly about it, because he really doesn't play anything like he use to.  So I was wondering what everyone's opinions are on this? It seems a little unfair to spend money on something just to have it changed to something it isn't.

replies.body:
I thought they changed this so that no refunds would be given out for reworked champs? 

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202294884-Champion-Update-Schedule
You should be able to get it refunded, and I believe you can get a refund if you message Support. If you can't then you should be able to.
